title: What technology should anyone learn to start a tech company? - Quora

response.answer_text: You shouldn't know a technology to start a startup, but you should learn how much time a product would take to complete along with cost and effort estimations. You should know some.good extensions to drill down a website's component and know how exactly it's running. In a nutshell you should know following : Business Problem IdentificationHow you can solve it (Research)Which kind of platfom will make it better (Website or App)Just get some good consultant or agency and let them do the work for you.Incase you are low on budget … just try to connect people over Facebook or other forums and know about the particular tech stack you wanna build up .Last but not the least … just utilise the free online cms tools and you can get your product ready for investors pitch.Hope It Would Be Of Some Help ….
